name: Touhou Before the Fog 東方原初帖~Assest RISK
name_original: Touhou Before the Fog 東方原初帖~Assest RISK
description:
Touhou Before the Fog 東方原初帖~Assest RISK is an adventure-RPG game developed by Izayoi Sakiteru. It came out on 26-06-2021.
You can play Touhou Before the Fog 東方原初帖~Assest RISK on PC and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
